.it.description: This is our local presence service to register .it domain
.it.name: Instra Local Presence Service

.it.description: This is the VAT number of a company, which is located within European Union members or the taxpayer code or passport number of the individual person as the registrant. Required if the Instra Local Presence Service field has the value Use Registrant Detail
.it.name: VAT Number / Passport No / Taxpayer Code

.it.description: This is the name of country where the company is incorporated or the country of birth of the individual person as the registrant. Required if the Instra Local Presence Service field has the value Use Registrant Detail
.it.name: Country of Incorporation /  Birth

.it.description: The type of registrant. Required if the Instra Local Presence Service field has the value Use Registrant Detail
.it.name: The type of registrant
